Detailed Description

CPuzzleGraphModel.

Description: The CPuzzleGraphModel class is a wrapper for the CPuzzleGraph. It is created to allow QObjects to connect to and recieve signals whenever any class has modified the underlying data.

Limitations: The signals will only be emitted if the CPuzzleGraphModel is used to edit. If it is bypassed and the CPuzzleGraph is directly manipulated then there will be no signals sent.

Definition at line 37 of file CPuzzleGraphModel.h.

void CPuzzleGraphModel::addEdge (  int  node1,
int  node2,
bool  bidirectional
) 
 

CPuzzleGraphModel::addEdge.

Description: This function adds an edge between the two indicated nodes. If the bidirectional flag is marked true, the new edge is bidirectional, otherwise, it is directional from node 1 to node 2.

Precondition:
None
Postcondition:
A new edge is created according to the given parameters.
Parameters:
node1,: This is the index value of the first node the edge is connected to.
node2,: This is the index value of the second node the edge is connected to.
bidirectional,: This variable is used to indicate if the edge is bidirectional (true) or directional (false).
Limitations: None

weight,: The weight to be set

Precondition:
None
Postcondition:
None
Parameters:
p,: The mouse click point
span,: Is set to the index of the clicked span or -1 is no span was clicked.
type,: Is set to the type of span clicked... 1 span from node1 to node2 was clicked 2 span from node2 to node1 was clicked 3 span is bidirectional
Returns:
void: No return information is given
Limitations: None

int  node2
)  const
 

CPuzzleGraphModel::findSpan.

Description: This function attempts to find a span which has the 2 given nodes as end points. It returns the index of the span if one is found and -1 if no span is found.

Precondition:
None
Postcondition:
None
Parameters:
node1,: This is the index of one of the nodes for the span.
node2,: This is the index of the other node for the span.
Returns:
int: Returns the index of the span if it is found and -1 otherwise.
Limitations: None
